ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Ministry of Defence, Combat Air, Fast Air Support Team (FAST)

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Ministry of Defence, Combat Air, Fast Air Support Team (FAST)

SHORT_DESCR.P: The FAST PT has received enhancement requests from the operational users that require changes to the Typhoon UK AMPA functionality. The dates for the roll-out of an operational P3E capability require that these enhancements be delivered incrementally to minimise the risk to the overall programme.

Version 7 (v 7) upgrade to the Advanced Mission Planning Aid (“AMPA”) Operating System particular to Typhoon aircraft known as TyAMPA to meet the modification to the Typhon aircraft at Phase 3 Enhancement (P3E) standard.

D_JUSTIFICATION.P: The Fast Air Support Team (FAST) Project Team, as part of the UK Ministry of Defence (“MoD”), intends to award a contract to Enterprise Services, Defence & Security UK Ltd for the procurement of a version 7 (v 7) upgrade to the Advanced Mission Planning Aid (“AMPA”) Operating System particular to Typhoon aircraft known as TyAMPA to meet the modification to the Typhon aircraft at Phase 3 Enhancement (P3E) standard. This requirement will deliver enhancements to the UK AMPA functionality.

It is considered that a new contract will be awarded using the negotiated procedure without prior publication of a contract notice in accordance with Article 28(1)(e) of Directive 2009/81/EC (Regulation 16(1)(a)(ii) of the UK Defence and Security Public Contract Regulations 2011) for technical reasons. This is because only Enterprise Services, Defence & Security UK Ltd has the requisite knowledge in relation to this equipment to meet the requirement. The upgrade of TyAMPA to v 7 to support the P3E standard of aircraft is a key capability enabler to meet the stated objectives, and the Ministry of Defence needs to use the same Mission Planning System to ensure interoperability for operational purposes.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTOR.OFFICIALNAME: Enterprise services defence and security UK limited
ADDRESS_CONTRACTOR.ADDRESS: 1-3 Bartley Wood Business Park, (Hook B), Bartley Way

INFO_ADD.P: The Authority reserves the right to amend any condition related to security of information to reflect any changes in national law or government policy. If any contract documents are accompanied by instructions on safeguarding classified information (e.g. a Security Aspects Letter), the Authority reserves the right to amend the terms of these instructions to reflect any changes in national law or government policy, whether in respect of the applicable protective marking scheme, specific protective markings given, the aspects to which any protective marking applies, or otherwise. The link below to the Gov.uk website provides information on the Government Security Classification.

Advertising Regime OJEU:- This contract opportunity is published in the Official Journal of the European Union (OJEU),the MoD Defence Contracts Bulletin and www.contracts.mod.uk GO Reference: GO-2018116-DCB-11734996.

ADDRESS_REVIEW_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Ministry of Defence, Combat Air, Fast Air Support Team (FAST)
